sentences.english: The 2006 test produced a yield of less than one kiloton.
The ship lock ranks Grade III and has the navigation standard of four kiloton ship in one uplifting.
sentences.chinese: 船閘爲Ⅲ級，通航標準爲一頂四艘千噸級。

sentences.english: This year the organizers brought 9,000 tons of sand to Travemuende.
sentences.chinese: 今年主辦單位運送九千噸特製的沙到拉弗明德。

sentences.english: It could carry a single thermonuclear warhead with a maximum explosive force of 50 kilotons.
sentences.chinese: 它可以攜帶最多爲50千噸爆發力單一熱核彈頭。

sentences.english: Strong winds that blow across this part of Asia routinely pick up and deposit tens of thousands of tons of now exposed soil every year.
sentences.chinese: 亞洲該地區刮過的強風每年攜帶來上千噸的鹽分。

sentences.english: Satellite data suggested that the impact explosion had kicked out the energy equivalent of one kiloton of TNT.
sentences.chinese: 衛星數據顯示爆炸威力相當於1千噸TNT炸藥。

sentences.english: Last year, global production stood at 124, 000 tonnes.
